content.heading: <textarea> Tag
paragraphs: The <textarea> tag defines a multi-line text input control.

Example: <label for="w3review">Review of W3Schools:</label>
<textarea id="w3review" name="w3review" rows="4" cols="50">
At w3schools.com you will learn how to make a website. They offer free tutorials in all web development technologies.
</textarea>

content.heading: Definition and Usage
paragraphs: Used in forms for inputs like comments or reviews.
Holds unlimited characters, rendered in a fixed-width font (usually Courier).
Size set by cols and rows attributes or CSS.
Requires name for form submission and id for label association.

content.heading: Examples
paragraphs:
Disable resize: <html>
<head>
<style>
textarea { resize: none; }
</style>
</head>
<body>
<label for="w3review">Review of W3Schools:</label>
<textarea id="w3review" name="w3review" rows="4" cols="50">
At w3schools.com you will learn how to make a website. They offer free tutorials in all web development technologies.
</textarea>
</body>
</html>
